full_title: Die With A Smile by Lady Gaga & Bruno Mars
title: Die With A Smile

description.plain:
“Die With A Smile” was the comeback single by Lady Gaga and Bruno Mars, who both had not released music in two to three years. The song was surprise announced a day before the release on August 15, and released at 12am EST alongside the music video.

Gaga confirmed on the announcement post that this song is a song to hold fans over until she releases her highly anticipated seventh studio album, which she has teased throughout all of 2024; “Die With A Smile” would later be included as the last track on the album, titled MAYHEM, when it was released in 2025.

Gaining traction on social media, “Die With A Smile” won the award for “Best Pop Duo/Group Performance” at the GRAMMY’s 2025. With 121 days leading Spotify’s daily global chart, the soft rock duet became  the longest-running #1 hit in the history of the digital service. It ascended to the top of Billboard’s Radio Songs chart.

embed_content: Read “Die With A Smile” by Lady Gaga & Bruno Mars on Genius
recording_location: Shampoo Pree and Crul Studios and Shangri-La (Malibu, CA)

annotatable.title: Die With A Smile

body.plain:
“Die With A Smile” was the comeback single by Lady Gaga and Bruno Mars, who both had not released music in two to three years. The song was surprise announced a day before the release on August 15, and released at 12am EST alongside the music video.

Gaga confirmed on the announcement post that this song is a song to hold fans over until she releases her highly anticipated seventh studio album, which she has teased throughout all of 2024; “Die With A Smile” would later be included as the last track on the album, titled MAYHEM, when it was released in 2025.

Gaining traction on social media, “Die With A Smile” won the award for “Best Pop Duo/Group Performance” at the GRAMMY’s 2025. With 121 days leading Spotify’s daily global chart, the soft rock duet became  the longest-running #1 hit in the history of the digital service. It ascended to the top of Billboard’s Radio Songs chart.

(Ooh, ooh)

I, I just woke up from a dream
Where you and I had to say goodbye
And I don't know what it all means
But since I survived, I realized

Wherever you go, that's where I'll follow
Nobody's promised tomorrow
So I'ma love you every night like it's the last night
Like it's the last night

If the world was ending
I'd wanna be next to you
If the party was over
And our time on Earth was through
I'd wanna hold you just for a while
And die with a smile
If the world was ending
I'd wanna be next to you

(Ooh, ooh)

Ooh, lost, lost in the words that we scream
I don't even wanna do this anymore
'Cause you already know what you mean to me
And our love's the only war worth fighting for

Wherever you go, that's where I'll follow
Nobody's promised tomorrow
So I'ma love you every night like it's the last night
Like it's the last night

If the world was ending
I'd wanna be next to you
If the party was over
And our time on Earth was through
I'd wanna hold you just for a while
And die with a smile
If the world was ending
I'd wanna be next to you

Right next to you
Next to you
Right next to you
Oh-oh

If the world was ending
I'd wanna be next to you
If the party was over
And our time on Earth was through
I'd wanna hold you just for a while
And die with a smile
If the world was ending
I'd wanna be next to you
If the world was ending
I'd wanna be next to you

(Ooh, ooh)
I'd wanna be next to you
